[req]
default_bits = 4096
prompt = no
default_md = sha256
distinguished_name = dn 
x509_extensions = usr_cert

[ dn ]
C=US
ST=New York
L=New York
O=MyOrg
OU=MyOU
emailAddress=me@working.me
CN = ca.example.com

[ usr_cert ]
basicConstraints=CA:TRUE
subjectKeyIdentifier=hash
authorityKeyIdentifier=keyid,issuer
